name: TURBO QUEST 2
description:
Join Bukbuk and the mage Curie as they go on a road trip to restore the bird's memory.

Turbo Quest II is the spiritual sequel to the 2007 game Turbo Quest by soaponarope (@soap444).

The aim of this project was to make something quickly using only stock assets from RPGM2K3 (apart from a few SFX). And also to put a few jokes in.

This is a short game! It should take less than 1 hour to complete.

CONTENT WARNING: This game contains explicit language, but NO racism/bigotry/transphobia etc.
